purpose: Enable deployment of AI agents for interaction with users via WhatsApp, processing messages and images.
principle: Utilizes LangGraph for graph-based agent invocation and Twilio for WhatsApp messaging.
reusability: Template-based approach allows for easy customization and deployment on the LangGraph platform.
limitations: Requires Twilio account for WhatsApp integration; limited to platforms supported by LangGraph.
name: langgraph-whatsapp-agent
description: A template for building WhatsApp agents using LangGraph and Twilio. This project enables you to deploy AI agents that interact with users via WhatsApp, process messages and images, and invoke custom graph-based agents. It integrates with MCP and runs on the LangGraph Platform.
highlight: Seamless integration of AI agents with WhatsApp using LangGraph and Twilio.
